title: The New Empress - Novel Updates
tags: Empires   European Ambience   Female Protagonist   Handsome Male Lead
author: 양과람
description:
The symbol of the Apollinerian Empire is none other than the ‘bird’!

There was a legend in the empire that held birds as sacred and worshiped…

[On the day the (Divine Bird), made of silver and gold descends to this land, the empire will have everlasting glory.]

It was a trust that came down from the distant past.

Each interpretation was different, but people waited for the ‘(Divine Bird)’ to come down to this land one day.

One peaceful day, hundreds of years later. A fist-sized “egg” from heaven descended onto this land.>
